last_episode_to_air.name: Aftertastes
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Sicily, family ties usher in new beginnings as the next chapter in Amy and Lino's love story unfolds.

name: From Scratch
overview: An artist finds romance with a chef in Italy and embarks on a life-changing journey of love, loss, resilience and hope across cultures and continents.

episodes.name: First Tastes
episodes.overview: Torn between her dreams and her father's expectations, Amy arrives in Italy for an art program and meets a charming chef who gives her a new perspective.

episodes.name: Carne e Ossa
episodes.overview: Amy and Lino build a life together in Los Angeles while living in Amy's sister's apartment. A Thanksgiving family feast brings tensions to the table.

episodes.name: A Villa. A Broom. A Cake.
episodes.overview: Amid family drama on both sides, Amy and Lino celebrate a new chapter in the same place where their love story began.

episodes.name: Bitter Almonds
episodes.overview: Back in Los Angeles, Amy reaches a crossroads in her career and Lino seizes an opportunity â€” until devastating news brings their pursuits to a halt.

episodes.name: Bread and Brine
episodes.overview: Amy, Lino and their families are forced to face uncomfortable truths, make difficult decisions and heal old wounds.

episodes.name: Heirlooms
episodes.overview: Amy and Lino find a new source of joy and soon take on a series of unforeseen challenges.

episodes.name: Between the Fire and the Pan
episodes.overview: Amy and Idalia find support and strength in their family and try to prepare for what's to come.

episodes.name: Aftertastes
episodes.overview: In Sicily, family ties usher in new beginnings as the next chapter in Amy and Lino's love story unfolds.
